title: Can anyone share me names of best books for UPSC prelims preparation with pics? - Quora
tags: Exam and Test Prep Book Recommendations
Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: For UPSC , NCERTS are the basic books that you need to refer to. Besides them, you can refer to the following books. Savindra Singh's Physical GeographyLaxmikanth's Indian PolityArt and culture by Nitin SinghaniaRamesh Singh's Indian EconomyBipin Chandra's History of Modern India     You can find most of these books along with complete set of NCERTS for free of cost in Mypustak website. Besides these books, you should keep a daily track on Current Affairs and Science and Technology. Hope this helped you. Happy Reading!
